page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT IN CLOWNE.
page.content: THE FOLLOWING ARE THE MAIN INDRUSTRIAL EMPLOYERS IN THE VILLAGE: 1.MERIDIAN-A KNITWEAR FACTORY MAKING UNDERWEAR AND TEE SHIRTS.EMPLOYS 243 PEOPLE. 2.HARGREAVES HAULAGE AND CLEARWASTE EMPLOYS ALMOST 100 PEOPLE. 3.EAST MIDLAND BUS GARAGE EMPLOYS ABOUT 70 PEOPLE. 4.SIDETRACKER ENGINEERING-MAKES FORK LIFT TRUCKS AND EMPLOYS 15 PEOPLE. 5.CAPITAL REFRACTORS EMPLOYS 10 PEOPLE TO MAKE FURNACE LININGS FOR THE STEEL INDUSTRY. 6. DERBYSHIRE ENGRAVING AND LOGIC CONTROL SYSTEMS EMPLOYS 65 PEOPLE. 7.R.F.LUKE EMPLOYS 50 PEOPLE MAKING STEEL CHUTES FOR THE MINING INDUSTRY. 8.PENNY HYDRAULICS EMPLOYS 20 PEOPLE TO SURVEY GARAGE EQUIPMENT. 9.DERIM STEELS EMPLOYS 7 TO MAKE RE-ENFORCEMENT STEELS.
